channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT5816, MT5835, MT6885, MT6893, MT9900, MT9901, MT9950, MT9969, MT9970, MT9980

item.title: CVE-2022-20047|2024-08-03T01:55:46.215Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt5816%2C%20mt5835%2C%20mt6885%2C%20mt6893%2C%20mt9900%2C%20mt9901%2C%20mt9950%2C%20mt9969%2C%20mt9970%2C%20mt9980
item.description: In video decoder, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS05917489; Issue ID: ALPS05917489.

item.description: In video decoder, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check.
